heading: HR02449
0: A RESOLUTION STRONGLY URGING THE DEPARTMENT OF TRANSPORTATION TO IMPLEMENT A PILOT PROGRAM ALLOWING, MONITORING, AND REGULATING THE OPERATION OF DULY REGISTERED, ORGANIZED "HABAL-HABAL" OR MOTORCYCLES-FOR-HIRE AS AN ALTERNATIVE PUBLIC UTILITY VEHICLES TO EASE DAILY COMMUTING OF THE RIDING PUBLIC AND SUBMIT TO CONGRESS RECOMMENDATIONS FOR THE MOST APPROPRIATE AND REASONABLE REGULATORY FRAMEWORK BY WAY OF LEGISLATION
